summary: This is a brief email exchange from August 10, 2019, discussing a technical issue with viewing a PDF file. The email includes an attachment named 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Statementv2.pdf', indicating it may contain a statement from Jeffrey Epstein, sent shortly after his arrest and death.
keyFacts: An email exchange dated August 10, 2019, references an attachment named 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Statementv2.pdf'.
The email discusses a technical issue ('Weird. Maybe our phones do that. It looks fine when I PDF it.') with viewing a file, possibly a screenshot.
The date is significant as it is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, and his death on August 10, 2019.
The attachment suggests the existence of a statement from Jeffrey Epstein, potentially version 2.
The correspondence is minimal and does not name any specific individuals beyond the implied sender/recipient and Epstein in the filename.
